metadata.name: Curl Web Request With Potential Custom User-Agent
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "curl.exe" with a potential custom "User-Agent". Attackers can leverage this to download or exfiltrate data via "curl" to a domain that only accept specific "User-Agent" strings

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\curl.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('curl.exe') AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\s-H\\s' AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('user-agent:')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "curl.exe" with a potential custom "User-Agent". Attackers can leverage this to download or exfiltrate data via "curl" to a domain that only accept specific "User-Agent" strings
